item.title: How to join #DollyPartonChallenge ?
item.description: Super easy way to join this frenzy with PhotoGrid Grid & Text Feature Template *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}â–¶" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="How to join #DollyPartonChallenge ?"
